aththama kiwwoth loke aadareta karanda bari deyak nathuwa athi.kenek jiwithe lassana kara gannawa wagema,thawa kenek jiwithema apayak kara gannawa,mona nathath meken wenneth hadena eka hadila nathiwena eka nathiwena eka...man nan kiyanne apita aduwak nathuwa labena ekama aadaraya thama ape ammagenuyi,thaththagenuyi labena aadaraya..eke wiwadayak na.....mokada api loke dakinne ee 2ge aadaraya madde hinda.....eetath passe api thawath ayagen ee aadare hoyanda yanawa.samaharawita mita kalin dakalath nathi,aduranneth nathi kenekta aadare karala “eeka mage aadare kiyala kiyanawa.eya kiyana widiyata inna uthsaha karanawa, eya gana hoyala balanawa,eyawa sathutin thiyanna uthsaha karanawa...eeth eeka aadareda?,loba kamada?,aashawada?..

kramalekhana kriyawaliya pasuwa samajaya wisin pawara ganu labe.

biyagama wilej hotel athulu wyapara rasakama himikaru wu kotipathi wyaparika barnad jayarathna yana aya (65) ghathanaya kirime naduwa eeye (04 wanida) pugoda mahesthrath ha athireka disa winisuru pi. em. thilakarathna bandara mahatha hamuwe yali kandawu awasthawe ehi dewana sakakara miyagiya ayage puth suranga jayarathna ha thewana sakakara sudath wikramasinha yana ayawalun wisin aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwedi thamanta paharadun bawata adhikaranayata kiya siti heyin ema dedena nawatha adhikarana waidya niladhariwarayanata idiripath kota waidya warthawak adhikaranayata idiripath karana lesa mahesthrathwaraya bandhanagara adhikariwarayata niyoga keleya.thawada ehi palamuwana sakakara di. pi. susantha namaththata nagathibena anikuth chodanawa wana athbomba langathaba ganima sambandhawa nadu pawaranne pidakari awipanatha yatatheda nathinam thrasthawadi panatha yatathe da yanna gana nithipathi upades patha yawa thibena warthawa itha ikmaninma laba ganima sandaha nithipathiwarayata sihi kandawimak karana lesatada mahesthrathwaraya ohu athadanguwatagath kolambaa polis aparadha kottasayata niyoga kerini.me athara danata rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara sitina palamuwana, dewana, ha thewana sakakaruwan thidena wana dekatana padinchi di. pi. susantha nohoth nilanga, naranwala padinchi sudath wikramasinha ha biyagama padinchi suranga jayarathna yana ayawalun labana 18 wanida dakwa thawaduratath rakshitha bandhanagara gatha kara thabimatath mahesthrathwaraya niyama karanu labiya.me naduwa yali kandawu awasthawe aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwe polis parikshaka jayasekara mahatha adhikaranaya idiriye karunu dakwamin,me ghathana siddhiya sambandhawa methek sidu karana lada wimarshana katayuthuwala wadidura warthawak adhikaranayata idiripath karanawa.

ee pasalen patan gaththa gamana rupawahini thirayen chithrapatayakin awasan karanna oona kiyana thana mama hitiya.
